events.name: Build Your Own Heroku Using Dokku - StackUp Clinic
events.description:
One of the most popular PaaS providers today isHeroku. Heroku, along with other PaaS providers like Engine Yard is loved by developers because it makes the deployment of a new application extremely fast and simple. Since most developers rather write code than setting up and troubleshoot servers, it’s not hard to figure out why this approach is compelling.
If you don’t want to rely on a PaaS service like Heroku or Engine Yard, you can now with the help of tools like Dokku quickly set up your own PaaS service that will work much the same way (but without the pretty web interface).
 

AGENDA

What is Dokku and the architecture behind it?
Setup a VM on AWS
Install Dokku on the VM
Deploy a sample application on Dokku
QnA and debugging to help the participants


 
MEET THE PEOPLE



Neerav
Site Reliability Engineer, Cloudflare | Singapore
Speaker


First SRE hired in Singapore, my job involves setting up and maintaining servers across more than 100+ locations around the world handling, accelerating and protecting a significant portion of the internet and building automation; started the Singapore Docker Meetup around it.
 
RESERVING A SEAT

Enter the promotional code that accompanies the invitation email sent to you to reserve a seat.
events.location: StackUp Studio, 79 Ayer Rajah Crescent, #02-09, Singapore 139955, Singapore 139955
